September 26, 2016 by Anand Srinivasan 1 Comment The California state legislature recently approved the allocation of nearly $133 million to continue the Clean Vehicle Rebate Project. This is an initiative that was launched in 2009 to create incentives for the purchase of clean energy vehicles like battery-electric vehicles, plug-in hybrids and fuel-cell electric vehicles.
